SEARCH
Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.controller

Class CategoryController

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.controller.CategoryController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/categories") @CrossOrigin(origins="*", allowedHeaders="*", methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE}) public class CategoryController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling web requests related to the Category entity. Provides CRUD operations for Category through RESTful API endpoints.

    • getAllCategories

      @GetMapping @CrossOrigin public List<Category> getAllCategories()
      Fetches all categories.
      Returns:
      A list containing all categories.

    • getCategoryById

      @GetMapping("/{categoryId}") @CrossOrigin public Category getCategoryById(@PathVariable Long categoryId)
      Retrieves a specific category by its ID.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the desired category.
      Returns:
      The category with the specified ID.

    • addCategory

      Adds a new category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category to be added.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the operation.

    • updateCategory

      @PutMapping("/{categoryId}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateCategory(@PathVariable Long categoryId, @RequestBody Category category)
      Modifies an existing category.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to be updated.
      category - The updated category details.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the operation.

    • deleteCategory

      @DeleteMapping("/{categoryId}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteCategory(@PathVariable Long categoryId)
      Deletes a category.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to be removed.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the operation.

    • getCategoriesByTrend

      @GetMapping("/trend/{trendId}") @CrossOrigin public List<Category> getCategoriesByTrend(@PathVariable Long trendId)
      Retrieves categories associated with a specific trend.
      Parameters:
      trendId - the ID of the trend to find categories for.
      Returns:
      a list of categories associated with the given trend.

      Retrieves categories associated with a specific product.

      productId - the ID of the product to find categories for.
      Returns:
      a list of categories associated with the given product.

    • setCategoryPopularityForSeason

      @PostMapping("/{categoryId}/popularity/{season}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> setCategoryPopularityForSeason(@PathVariable Long categoryId, @PathVariable String season, @RequestBody int score)
      Updates the popularity score of a category for a given season.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category whose popularity score is to be set.
      season - The season for which the popularity score is to be set.
      score - The popularity score.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the operation.

    • getCategoryPopularityForSeason

      @GetMapping("/{categoryId}/popularity/{season}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> getCategoryPopularityForSeason(@PathVariable Long categoryId, @PathVariable String season)
      Retrieves the popularity score of a category for a given season.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category whose popularity score is to be retrieved.
      season - The season for which the popularity score is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A response containing the popularity score.

    • getAllCategoryPopularities

      @GetMapping("/{categoryId}/all-popularities") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Integer>> getAllCategoryPopularities(@PathVariable Long categoryId)
      Retrieves all popularity scores of a category across seasons.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category whose popularity scores are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A response containing a list of popularity scores.

    • getCategoryPopularityOverview

      @GetMapping("/{categoryId}/popularity-overview") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Map<String,Object>>> getCategoryPopularityOverview(@PathVariable Long categoryId)
      Fetches the popularity overview for a specific category. This overview provides detailed popularity metrics associated with the given category ID.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The unique identifier of the category for which the popularity overview is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of popularity data maps for the specified category and an HTTP status.
